Package org.moeaframework.algorithm.continuation

package org.moeaframework.algorithm.continuation
Extends an algorithm with "continuations" or "restarts", where we periodically reseed an algorithm with random solutions and optionally adjust the settings.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.moeaframework.algorithm
    Implementations of various algorithms and support tools for working with algorithms.
    org.moeaframework.algorithm.pso
    Implementations of various Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algorithms.
    org.moeaframework.algorithm.sa
    Implementations of various simulated annealing (SA) algorithms.
    org.moeaframework.algorithm.single
    Implementations of various single-objective optimization algorithms.
  • Class
    Description
    AdaptiveTimeContinuation
    Decorator for EvolutionaryAlgorithms to add time continuation (restarts).
    EpsilonProgressContinuation
    Extends AdaptiveTimeContinuation to trigger restarts using ε-progress.
    RestartEvent
    An event emitted by AdaptiveTimeContinuation indicating a time continuation (restart) event has occurred.
    RestartListener
    The listener interface for receiving time continuation (restart) events.
    RestartType
    Enumeration of different restart types during adaptive time continuation.
